etm.core.aggregation.persistence
Class PersistentRootAggregator

java.lang.Object
  etm.core.aggregation.RootAggregator
      etm.core.aggregation.persistence.PersistentRootAggregator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Aggregator
public class PersistentRootAggregator
extends RootAggregator

An aggregator that supports persistence provided by a PersistenceBackend. By default the persistence backend is FileSystemPersistenceBackend, however you may supply a custom backends during initialization.

Since:
1.2.0
Version:
$Revision:96 $
Author:
void.fm
